text: Radio Kapilvastu is a first community radio of Kapilvastu District, Nepal. It broadcasts on 104.2 MHz by a 100 watt FM transmitter, and covers kapilvastu rupandehi Dang Arghakhachi and Uttar Pradesh. Social information, music and health message broadcasting for social awareness . == Programs == *Bhojpuri music program, *News in awadhi == References == Category:Radio in Nepal
title: Radio Kapilvastu
